prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features the sounds of Drums, Bass, Piano, and Guitar, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Bass, Piano, and Guitar, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
This piece is played with Drums, Bass, Piano, and Guitar, but Pipe is not included.
